p: Catechin is a polyphenolic antioxidant flavonoid with molecular formula C 15H 14O 6 has proven to possess antiviral and anti-inflammatory activities ( Figure 4(a)). Quercetin is polyphenolic flavonoid belonging to class of organic compounds referred as flavonoids ( Figure 4(b)). Quercetin with molecular formula C 15H 10O 7 has potential antiviral, anti-inflammatory, antiallergy and chemo-preventive activities ( Figure 4(c)). Hederagenin, sapogenin with molecular formula C 30H 48O 4 ( Figure 4(d)) and oleanolic acid, pentacyclic triterpenoid with molecular formula C 30H 48O 3 ( Figure 4(d)).
